#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define x getchar_unlocked()

typedef long long ll;

ll modpow(ll a, ll b){
	ll ret = 1, yy =  a % MOD; 
	while( b > 0){
		if(b&1)
			ret = (ret*yy) % MOD;
		yy = (yy*yy) % MOD;
		b /= 2;
	}
	return ret % MOD;
}

void read(ll & n){
	n = 0;
	char ch = x; int sign = 1;
	while(ch < '0' || ch > '9')
	{ if(ch == '-') sign = -1; ch = x; }
	while(ch >= '0' && ch <='9'){
		n = (n*10)%MOD + ch -'0';
		ch = x;
	}
	n *= sign;
}
char n1[100005], n2[100005];
void calc_out()
{
    ll temp=0, i, ans=1;
    for(i=0; n1[i]!='\0'; i++)
        temp=(10*temp+n1[i]-'0') % MOD;
    for(int i=0; n2[i]!='\0'; i++)
        ans=(modpow(ans,10)*modpow(temp,n2[i]-'0'))%MOD;
    printf("%lld\n", ans);
}

int main(){
	ll t, a, b, res;
	read(t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%s %s",n1,n2);
		calc_out();
		//res = modmul(a,b);
		//printf("%lld\n",res);
	}
	return 0;
}
